import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'../styles/Signup.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SignupForm=()=>{const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[fullname,setFullname]=useState('');const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[address,setAddress]=useState('');const[phone,setPhone]=useState('');const[isSubmitting,setIsSubmitting]=useState(false);const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSignup=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setIsSubmitting(true);setMessage('');setError('');try{const response=await axios.post('https://backendjt-1.onrender.com/create',{username,password,fullname,email,address,phone});setMessage(response.data.message);navigate('/');// Redirect to login page after successful signup
